title: Go to the store
text:
You need:

Lemons
Grapes
Avocado
Brisket
Poppyseed dressing
Asparagus
Anything else you want

title: Take Lizzie to school
text: She needs to be there around 4:30 in the morning

title: Run a marathon tomorrow
text: Tomorrow is the annual marathon running so you should run it it :)

title: Feed friend's hamster
text:
Zayne needs his hamster fed tomorrow morning and afternoon before he gets back from China at around 9pm

dont forget!!!!!!!!
